data_table.description: Venipuncture Form, VENA, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: VENBFLAG
variable.description: 1= if form is present [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]

variable.name: VENBCY
variable.description: Contact year [4] [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]

variable.name: VENB01
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Do you have any bleeding disorder? Q1 [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]

variable.name: VENB04
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Was all blood drawn before the snack? Q4 [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]

variable.name: VENB05
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Number of venipuncture attempts. Q5 [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]

variable.name: VENB06
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Filling time of tube 1 (seconds). Q6 [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]

variable.name: VENB07
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Was tourniquet reapplied? Q7 [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]

variable.name: VENB14
variable.description: [Blood processing]. Paper Incident Record Used? Q14 [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]

variable.name: VENB03HM
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Time of blood drawing. Q3 [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]

variable.name: VENB09HM
variable.description: [Blood processing]. Time at which specimen tubes 2-7 were spun. Q9 [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]

variable.name: VENB10HM
variable.description: [Blood processing]. Time at which specimen tube 1 was spun. Q10 [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]

variable.name: VENB11HM
variable.description: [Blood processing]. Time at which specimens were placed in freezer. Q11 [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Venipuncture Form, VENB, Cohort Visit 2]
